author: Guangxi Province Almanac
notes: Guangxi Province Almanac: Ethnic Gazetteer. [广西通志. 民族志.] 2009. Nanning: Guangxi People's Publishing House [广西人民出版社].This Yi dialect is spoken in Powu 坡五, Napo County, Guangxi, China. The speakers' autonym is ma21 dʑi21 (while the Yi of Longlin County have the autonym ŋo33 phu21).
